Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.softwareag.gcs.wm.codereview.operations.Operation

  • public abstract class Operation
extends java.lang.Object
    Operation Abstract class to provide functionality needed to implement Code Review Check Operations

      • getParameters

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getParameters()
        Gets the parameters defined in the configuration file for the check. - Where a parameter is named ${parameterName} this will be replaced with the value of that environment variable - Where a parameter is named %parameterName% this will use the value of the global parameter with the same name
        Returns:
        list of parameter values

      • performOperation

        public void performOperation()
        Perform the actual code check operation. The creates the results object, calls the abstract method overridden by each operation, then calculates the summary this is what needs to be called by a Check operation.

        Adds the results of the test
        Parameters:
        true/false - to indicate whether the test passed
